item.title: About Me
item.description: This is just a bit of information about me. I’m a graduate student working on computational biology. And an avid reader of both fiction, history, and popular science. This website is an attempt to analyze and discuss in detail, as well as evaluate the evidence for and against memes about (pseudo-) science floating around in cyberspace.
